about_the_game:
Brownie’s back, and so is the chaos! After saving the world (and annoying everyone along the way), you’re ready for one final ham-fisted adventure. What could go wrong? A lot, apparently.

After being trapped in a hellish alien dimension (South Yorkshire), you thought retirement was within reach. The Spoon of Power’s locked away, and Grundolph’s spirit is harmless... right?

Venture through working men's club parties, 24-hour all-night shrubberies, and fire-regulation-busting, volcano-adjacent coffee shops in this final comedy outing.


  • Find Kluberries in the wilderness and exchange them for 'glimpses into the future' (optional clues).

  • Seek out companions who can enhance your verbs with additional abilities and interactions.

  • A veritable orgy of puzzles and original mechanics to keep you scratching your head until it becomes raw and swollen.

  • Fill your very own achievement room with unique gifts and artefacts that link in with your steam achievements.

  • Use new magic to gain insights into NPCS, gain advantages and store the information in your own private Tome.

  • In-depth ambient soundscapes and a live instrument recorded folk/fantasy original soundtrack.

Renowned for its sharp writing, originality, absurd humor, and unforgettable musical compositions, the Brownie's Adventure series reaches its most ambitious chapter yet. Every furlong of this hand-drawn finale has been crafted with care, from its intricate puzzles to its sweeping, needlessly orchestral soundtrack.

Whether you’re a long-time fan or delving into the series for the first time, this epic adventure stands on its own while offering a heartfelt nod to its absurd roots.

The stakes have never been higher, the laughs more ridiculous, or the challenges more enjoyable. So, gear up and crack on—because if Brownie doesn’t save the world(s), who will? The RSPCA? Ofcom? You, ideally. That would be great.

content_descriptors.notes: Character's may explode and/or die in horrific circumstances in simplistic pixel animation.

short_description: "A (mostly) traditional yet wildly original 1990s-style adventure comedy. Journey through a realm of fantasy—and, er... South Yorkshire—as you bumble your way toward saving both worlds from almost-certain doom. Possibly Redemption?".
